name: Nature's Guardian (beta)
description:
In a world where technology and nature are in constant war with one another, technology seems to be winning. The Earth, once in balance, now seems to be tipping in the favor of technology, and the two gods that keep the Earth in balance decide that enough is enough, sending in a guardian (that’s you!) to fight for the side of Nature and restore balance to the Earth.

In this ability-focused platformer, fight unique enemies, find secrets, and make friends or foes along the way! Each ability has different quirks and special talents, so try to explore them all!

Feedback form: https://forms.gle/PpB3E81jG7rNcGTr5

Discord server: https://discord.gg/RQDn9auKfC
